description: While shields are full, movement speed doubles, but standing still causes 8*player level fire damage.
Bullets that hit your shield have a 10% chance to ricochet back at attackers.
Shotguns always have full damage when this shield is equipped.
Briefly gain invisibility for 1 turn when shields start recharging. resets on full charged shields
When you didn’t take damage last round, fully regain shields.

effect: It's a Feature, Not a Bug
description: Shields randomly overcharge while recharging, doubling capacity for 2 rounds but preventing recharge after.
Nearby enemies suffer 40*shield level Shock DoT while shields are full.
Enemies who break your shield take 50% increased damage from all sources.
Can sacrifice 50% of your max shield capacity to gain 2 extra movements this turn.
Your shield capacity is reduced by 50%, but once per combat it recharges instantly when fully depleted.
Dealing a critical hit restores a small portion of shields equal to crit damage.
Taking melee damage knocks both you and the attacker back 2 squares.
When shield breaks, Cryo nova is applied to nearby enemies at half damage but they get slowed.
While shields are broken, enemies are more likely to attack other targets if in their attack range.
Shield only recharges when no allies are nearby, but capacity is increased by 50%.
Each time your shield is depleted, a random status effect resistance is gained for 2 rounds.
Taking health damage instead of shield damage doubles your total shield recharge speed.
Shield recharge rate is doubled, but it has a random chance while charging to discharge and reset to zero, dealing a shock nova damage around you in 3x3.

effect: I Can Do This All Day
description: Blocking melee attacks reduces half the damage.
